sentences: Meil on vaja teha uusi planeerimisi.
Toode sisestati turule suvel ja see on väga uusi.
context: The Estonian word 'uusi' is the plural form of 'uus', which means 'new'. It's used to describe something that has just come into existence or been created recently. Commonly, it refers to new items, information, people (like friends), or situations.
